stories.text:
Try to add subtitle in MP4 video format, but no for MP4 'recognized format file' in its menu

On Linux anyone knowledgeable on how to accomplish this ?
stories.title: Ask HN: How to edit MP4 video's subtitle by use of aegisub
Taurus: Lightweight Parallel Logging for In-Memory Database Management Systems

stories.text:
As a parent, the most important thing in the world is our kid’s safety. The last thing we want is our kid to be at the wrong place at the wrong time. Since you’re not always at home with your kids, you can hardly make sure he/she won’t be in places they’re not supposed to pose possibilities of kidnappings.

I learned a lot here about tracking my children and ensuring their safety: https://www.lifechacha.com/geofences-iphone-android/
stories.title: How Can Parents Keep Track of Their Children
Berkshire Hathaway’s Charlie Munger Takes Another Swipe at Robinhood
Transfer WhatsApp Messages from iPhone to Android
Bill Gates warns 'we've NOT seen the worst of Covid'

stories.text:
~5 years Python, STEM non-cs degree that all recruiters tell me is “amazing.” For this reason (?) get interviews, 0/ many. People seem to like me at my current shitty job, and management likes that I am a good little slave. But people don’t ever take me seriously - always peg me as “long hair, don’t care.”

This is a cry for help, feel free to give advice, a job interview or just commiserate if you’re in the same boat.
stories.title: Am I the only person who can’t get a job?
